ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound peeled and deveined medium shrimp

cookingTips: Marinate shrimp in seasoning and oil for 15-30 minutes before grilling
Thread shrimp on skewers for easy handling on the grill
Grill 2-3 minutes per side to avoid overcooking delicate shrimp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Quick-cooking shrimp is perfect for weeknight grilling. The Cajun seasoning and fresh lime create bold flavors.
